Everyone can thank Tatsuko "tatchan1024" for taking the time to
research the Manga Musashi no Ken and find and photocopying the pages
we are interested in.

I have scanned the pages from the manga and uploaded Tatsuko's
translations in the "files" section in the Musashi folder.

You also have the option of dowloading the scans+translations as a zip
file at
http://www.streamload.com/secretarytocapt3
password makoto 

I wonder, since they drew him as a shadow/silhouette if they actually
showed him in the episode of the anime.
